title: Adopt ConditionalFact
body:
See https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/648#discussion_r64906640

We need to reference `xunit.netcore.extensions` so that we can enable tests that (on Windows) require elevated privileges (currently for symlink creation).

nodes.body: We can use ConditionalFact at this point. I don't know if there are more places you want it, but the original impetus doesn't seem relevant at this point.
